INVALID_PORT: Your Bittorrent Client port {port} is illegal, it must be a number and be in 1-65535.
BLACKLIST_PORT: Your Bittorrent Client port {port} is in the blacklist, please check the site description.
INVALID_UPLOAD: Uploaded must be a number greater than or equal to 0!
INVALID_DOWNLOAD: Downloaded must be a number greater than or equal to 0!
